Title: Provides a tax credit for the cost of subscriptions that support local newspapers and other local media and a payroll tax credit for compensation of journalists; and to provide for the repeal of such provisions
Summary: Provides a tax credit for the cost of subscriptions that support local newspapers and other local media and a payroll tax credit for compensation of journalists; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit for the cost of subscriptions that support local newspapers and other local media and a payroll tax credit for compensation of journalists; and to provide for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
